channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: London locals go to war with upmarket British bakery chain Gail’s over gentrification and its right-leaning chairman
item.description: Hundreds of people have signed a petition trying to block a new Gail's in Walthamstow, namechecking its divisive chairman.

item.title: Instagram fails to crack down on hate speech against women politicians as elections near, CCDH says
item.description: Instagram failed to remove toxic comments directed at U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris and other leading female politicians, the CCDH said in a report.

item.title: No more 'boring gym.' How the fitness industry is reinventing itself.
The ‘sustainability recession’ will end soon—and not by choice
item.description: It’s possible that most of the ESG pullback is for show—a reverse form of virtue signaling.

item.title: UBS CEO says it's too early to talk about a U.S. recession, but a slowdown is possible
item.description: UBS CEO Sergio Ermotti said market volatility could intensify in the second half of the year, but he does not believe the U.S. is heading into a recession.

item.title: The new Realtor rules are about to change how we buy homes in a big way
Montana governor raked in more than $23 million in income over four years
item.description: Most of Greg Gianforte’s income since 2019 came from profits on investments, his tax returns indicate. He is paid about $120,000 a year for being governor.

item.title: Social Security is a key issue for voters, CNBC poll finds. Here's how to maximize benefits
item.description: Voters say Social Security is an important issue in the upcoming U.S. presidential election. Yet many don't understand how Social Security works.

item.title: Arends: Trump’s return to Twitter helps crush his Truth Social stock
X ordered to pay €550,000 to Irish employee fired for not replying to Elon Musk’s yes-or-resign ‘extremely hardcore’ ultimatum
item.description: It is the largest sum the agency has ever awarded.

item.title: Wednesday's analyst calls: Starbucks gets upgraded, a buying opportunity in Chipotle?
item.description: Two companies involved in leadership shake-ups were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Wednesday.

item.title: Why a historic surge in the VIX wasn’t the signal investors thought it was
Bluetongue virus cases are soaring in Europe—these are the symptoms to look out for
item.description: Bluetongue is a non-contagious, insect-borne viral disease that affects ruminants such as sheep and cows but not pigs or horses.

item.title: Chinese tech giant Tencent's quarterly profit jumps 82% as key gaming unit accelerates
item.description: Tencent shares are up 27% this year, in part due to excitement around a new game called Dungeon & Fighter Mobile (DnF Mobile).

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq score biggest 4-day rally of 2024 as inflation data buoys market
